feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-24T15:59:02.178165Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Zenbleed</stitle>; <id>;https://lock.cmpxchg8b.com/zenbleed.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T14:57:10.1946 80Z</updated>; <link href="https://lock.cmpxchg8b.com/zenbleed.html"/>; <author>; <name>;loeg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=loeg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lock.cmpxchg8b.com/img/zb-vpcmpeqb.svg" style="width: 220px; height : 117 像素;" />;<br />;最近的CPU已将向量寄存器的宽度扩展到256位甚至512位，这在各种情况下都很有用。本文讨论了标准 C 库函数中向量寄存器的使用以及使用 vzeroupper 指令以避免不必要的停顿的必要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zenbleed" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36848680" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Driver.js ：产品介绍、亮点、上下文帮助等</stitle>; <id>;https://driverjs.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T12:57:10.195676Z</updated>; <link href="https://driverjs.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://driverjs.com/driver.svg" style="宽度：220px；高度：324px；" />;<br />;由于其广泛的 API，driver.js 可用于广泛的用例。通过突出显示功能，您可以消除干扰并将用户的注意力集中在重要的事情上。为您的用户提供上下文帮助，解释如何使用您的产品并回答常见问题。突出显示新功能，解释如何使用它们并确保您的用户不会错过它们。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#driver-js-product-tours-highlights-contextual-help-and-more" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846520" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Atari 推出了复古经典的收藏级街机电路板</stitle>; <id>;https://retrododo.com/atari-collectible-arcade-circle-boards/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T13:57:10.196456Z</updated>; <link href="https://retrododo.com/atari-collectible-arcade-circle- Boards/"/>; <author>; <name>;ajdude</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ajdude</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://retrododo.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/atari_boards1-800x450.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Atari 推出了具有收藏价值的复古经典街机电路板，可以用作损坏柜子的替换板，也可以作为令人惊叹的墙饰展示。这些板是与 Retro Arcade 合作创建的，并具有游戏徽标的丝网印刷图形和历史细分。目前，Atari 系列有五种复制品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#atari-has-launched-collectible-arcade- Circuit-boards-of-retro-classics" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36848037" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：我构建了一个公交旅行时间地图</stitle>; <id>;https://map.henryn.xyz</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T13:57:10.197199Z</updated>; <link href="https://map.henryn.xyz"/>; <author>; <name>;ng-henry</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ng-henry</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-built-a-transit-travel-time-map" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847960" target="_blank">;[comments ]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Pikchr：用于技术文档中图表的类似 PIC 的标记语言</stitle>; <id>;https://pikchr.org/home/doc/trunk/doc/userman.md</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T12:57:10.19862 5Z</updated>; <link href="https://pikchr.org/home/doc/trunk/doc/userman.md"/>; <author>; <name>;gjadi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gjadi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这是使用 Pikchr 生成图表的指南。这里的目标是提供一个实用且易于理解的 Pikchr 使用教程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pikchr-a-pic-like-markup-language-for-diagrams-in-technical-documentation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847133" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;WASM_of_OCaml</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ocaml-wasm/wasm_of_ocaml</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T15:25:10.199324Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/ocaml-wasm/wasm_of_ ocaml"/>; <author>; <name>;eriangazag</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=eriangazag</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/7533499ebb7448d12547f839cbc99c9a6acd183051c823f58c36c5 7ecfa856ed/ocaml-wasm/wasm_of_ocaml" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;Wasm_of_ocaml 依赖于 Binaryen 工具链。生成的代码适用于 Chrome beta 和 Node V8 canary。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#wasm-of-ocaml" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36849478" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;SVG Chromium bug 已有 10 多年历史</stitle>; <id>;https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=109212</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T13:57:10.199998Z</updated>; <link href="https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=109212 "/>; <author>; <name>;tansan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tansan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;关于单轨铁路用户指南 发行说明 单轨铁路条款反馈 隐私 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#svg-chromium-bug-is-more-than-10-years-old" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847258" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;更改 Android 强制门户页面 (2020)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.encrypted.at/android-captive-portal/</id>; <updated>;2 023-07-24T12:57:10.200673Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.encrypted.at/android-captive-portal/"/>; <作者>; <name>;transpute</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=transpute</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.encrypted.at/wp-content/upload s/2020/04/android-debugging.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 126px;" />;<br />;如果您不希望 Android 手机在切换网络时始终联系 Google 服务器，您可以自行托管强制门户页面。为此，您需要一个 Web 服务器并能够返回“204 无内容”HTTP 状态代码。您可以通过打开手机的 shell/终端连接并使用适当的命令来更改 URL。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#changing-the-android-captive-portal- page-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846567" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：Artie (YC S23) – 实时数据复制到数据仓库</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847569</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T13:57:10.201353Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847569"/>; <author>; <name>;tang8330</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tang8330</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Artie 是一个开源数据流解决方案，解决数据仓库中生产数据过时的问题。它支持从数据库到数据仓库的实时数据复制，具有亚分钟级的延迟并显着节省成本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-artie-yc-s23-real-time-data-replication-to-data-warehouses" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847569" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Unicode 字符“𝕏”(U+1D54F)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.compart.com/en/unicode/U+1D54F</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T11:57:10.202051Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.compart.com/en/uni code/U+1D54F"/>; <author>; <name>;t0m44c</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=t0m44c</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;U+1D54F 是字符 Mathematical Double-Struck Capital X 的 unicode 十六进制值。 Char U+1D54F，编码，HTML 实体：𝕏, D54F;,𝕏、UTF-8（十六进制）、UTF-16（十六进制）、UTF-32（十六进制）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unicode-character-u-1d54f" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846076" target="_blank ">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;问 HN：最近哪篇研究论文让您大吃一惊？</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846965</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T12:57:10.20271 8Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846965"/>; <author>; <name>;froster</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=froster</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;研究人员从警方拍卖网站上买下了一堆缴获的手机，发现其中约 25% 可以轻松解锁，并且仍然保存着嫌疑人和受害者的敏感数据。根据已灭绝的古代大麻野生型的原始位置的分布情况，从籼稻和籼稻转向喜马拉雅大麻和籼稻大麻。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-which-recently-research-paper-blow-your-mind" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846965" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;让事情脱离谈判的“三件事”练习（2011）</stitle>; <id>;https://math.stanford.edu/~vakil/thirdthings.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T02:57:10.204022Z</updated>; <link href="https://math.stanford.edu/~vakil/thirdthings.html "/>; <author>; <name>;mutant_glofish</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mutant_glofish</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;“三件事”练习是一种从演讲中提取有价值信息的方法。目标是将演讲中的三个关键要点写在一张纸或索引卡上。这些要点可以是定理、激发问题、问题或演讲中突出的任何其他内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the- Three-things-exercise-for-getting-things-out-of-talks-2011" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842239" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MermaidJS 中序列图的不合理有效性</stitle>; <id>;https://jessems.com/posts/2023-07-22-the-unreasonable-effectness-of-sequence-diagrams-in-mermaidjs</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T10:57:10.20 4687Z</updated>; <link href="https://jessems.com/posts/2023-07-22-the-unreasonable-effectness-of-sequence-diagrams-in-mermaidjs"/>; <作者>; <name>;jessems</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jessems</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://jessems.com /_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F20230722225447.477bc2cf.png&w=1920&q=75" style="宽度：220px；高度：90px；" />;<br />;使用 MermaidJS 在代码中创建序列图出奇地令人愉快。它们快速、无痛且美观。 MermaidJS 与 Markdown 工具相结合是在实践中使用序列图的便捷方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-unreasonable-effectness-of-sequence-diagrams-in-mermaidjs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36845714" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Twitter 已正式将其徽标更改为“X”</stitle>; <id>;https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/24/twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T09:57:10.206001Z</updated>; <link href="https://techcrunch. com/2023/07/24/twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x/"/>; <作者>; <name>;pallas_athena</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pallas_athena</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://techcrunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/x-twitter.jpg ?w=730" 样式="宽度：220 像素；高度：101 像素；" />;<br />;Twitter 已正式将其徽标更改为“X”。 Twitter 首席执行官埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 宣布了徽标变更，并暗示 Twitter 品牌将进一步发生变化。马斯克对字母“X”的痴迷是众所周知的，因为他创立了多家名称中含有“X”的公司。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36845111" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我对身份生物识别证明有何看法？</stitle>; <id>;https://vitalik.ca/general/2023/07/24/biometric.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T15:12:10.206660Z</updated>; <link href="https://vitalik.ca/general/2023/07/24/biometric.html "/>; <author>; <name>;Multiset</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Multiset</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://vitalik.ca/images/biometric/orb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 211px;" />;<br />;以太坊社区的人们一直在尝试构建一个更棘手但可能是最有价值的小工具之一，那就是去中心化的人格证明解决方案。世界币是一个更大、更雄心勃勃的身份证明项目，它依赖于高度复杂的生物识别技术，使用名为“Orb”的专用硬件扫描每个用户的虹膜。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-do-i-think-about-biometric-proof-of-personhood" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36849277" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Debian riscv64</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.aurel32.net/welcome-debian-riscv64.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T01:57:10.207309Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.aurel32.net/welcome-debian-riscv64.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;经过多年的努力，Debian riscv64现已成为官方架构。该端口需要重新启动、修复错误并重新安装构建守护程序，然后才能发布。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#debian-riscv64" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841798" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;Nat 类型</stitle>; <id>;https://www.roxlu.com/2021/070/nat-types</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T12:57:10.207946Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.roxlu.com/2021/070/nat-types"/>; <作者>; <名称>;signa11</名称>; <uri>;https://new s.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.roxlu.com/images/posts/2021/070.nat-sent-packets.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;当深入研究点对点通信时，您会遇到 STUN、ICE 和 NAT。本文重点介绍 NAT 的工作原理以及您需要了解的有关点对点连接的知识。 NAT 是一种用于在您的网络和其他网络之间转换数据包的设备，它在 Internet 的运行中发挥着至关重要的作用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nat-types" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846597" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 H N：我的钢笔绘图之旅</stitle>; <id>;https://adamfuhrer.com/pen-plotting-experiments</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T02:57:10.209956Z</updated>; <link href="https://adamfuhrer.com/pen-plotting-experiments"/>; <author>; <name>;adamfuhrer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=adamfuhrer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.adamfuhrer.com/assets/images/main-gradient.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;多伦多前端工程师。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-my-pen-plotting-journey" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842182" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;C89 编译器从 C 代码生成可打印的可执行文件 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~tom7/abc/paper.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T07:57:10.210603Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~tom7/abc/paper.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>; CharlesW</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=CharlesW</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;G3"1pfu nuaj x4(plxd$@$ 49p%@ g!e xg1e "j"x4"ph dxd4,,zp% @!. '' - a j-x4, bj, cy & z-z',/() <a href="https://hacker news.betacat.io/#c89-compiler- Produces-printable-executables-from-c-code-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821985" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;研究人员在加密的警用和军用无线电中发现“后门”</stitle>; <id>;https://www.vice.com/en/article/4a3n3j/backdoor-in-police-radios-tetra-burst</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T11:57:10.211246Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.vice.com/en/article /4a3n3j/backdoor-in-police-radios-tetra-burst"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://video-images.vice.com/topics/57a205628cb727dec795a6b1/callout_logo /1614199980283-screen-shot-2021-02-24-at-34918-pm.png?resize=240:*" style="width: 220px; height: 219px;" />;<br />;一组网络安全研究人员在全球警察、军队和关键基础设施实体使用的加密无线电中发现了一个后门。该后门可能已经存在了几十年，可能会暴露通过这些无线电传输的敏感信息。研究人员发现了地面集群无线电 (TETRA) 标准中的漏洞，包括 TEA1 加密算法中的一个简化步骤，允许使用消费者级硬件对拦截的流量进行被动解密。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#researchers-find-backdoor-in-encrypted-police-and-military-radios" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846242" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;恢复 IBM RS/6000 工作站</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/tubetimeus/status/1671654843138854912</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T13:57:10.213022Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/tubetimeus/status/16716548 43138854912"/>; <author>; <name>;mef</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mef</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不要担心 - 让我们再试一次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reviving-an-ibm-rs-6000-workstation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847831" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;IBM 大型机：它如何运行以及为何生存</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/07/the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it-survives/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T11:57:10.213725Z</updated>; <link href="https:// arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/07/the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it-survives/"/>; <author>; <name>;rbc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2 023/06/new_IBM_z16-800x452.webp" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：125 像素；" />;<br />;大型计算机至今仍然具有重要意义，估计有 10,000 台在使用。它们被世界上最大的公司使用，其中大部分来自 IBM。大型机旨在处理大量数据工作负载并提供高可靠性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it-survives" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846195" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;HP 45（以及 35 和 80）计算器模拟器</stitle>; <id>;https://sarahkmarr.com/retrohp1973.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T03:57:10.214401Z</updated>; <link href="https://sarahkmarr.com/retrohp1973. html"/>; <author>; <name>;linsomniac</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=linsomniac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://sarahkmarr.com/hp1973Window.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;HP-1973 是一个基于 Python 的计算器模拟器，可以运行 HP-45、HP-35 和 HP-80 计算器的 ROM 代码。它提供了一个带有各种自定义选项的 GUI 界面，并提供了有关计算器内部工作原理的详细帮助。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hp-45-and-35-and-80-calculator-emulator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842839" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
